fullDescription.intro:
This node can be used to load java classes from a file (output from Maven plugin SourceCrawler) or load them directly from directory.
To create xml file from standalone version of SourceCrawler you have to follow instructions from site https://github.com/ImpressiveCode/ic-utils
This node analyzes information about every class in every .java file from the given directory or xml file which has been found by SourceCrawler and returns a table with the following data:
Class name
Package
Class access
Class type
Does class represent an exception
Is the class inside another
Is this a class used for testing
Is this class final
File path

ports.outPort: Table with Java classes with their properties
